page.title: 08LIFE IN CUCKFIELD-CHILDREN
page.content: After visiting Cuckfield Primary School we acquired the following information: The ages range from{7 to {11}years. The children rise at about 7am on a school day and 8am at the weekend. Cereal, toast, orange juice, tea is the main breakfast. School begins at 9am and they either walk or go by car. The children have to wear uniform and most like it. There are mixed feelings about school. The favourite lesson is Art and the worst Maths. For break they have 15mins in which they play chase and for lunch, 1 hour. School finishes at 3.30pm after which they watch T.V, play with friends and go to clubs- Brownies/ Guides, Cubs/Scouts, Sports and youth clubs. The main time for tea is 6pm. Bedtime is 8.30 to 9.30pm during the week and an hour later at the weekend. On Sunday many go to Sunday school.
